thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Yext Announces Q4 Loss Per Share Of $0.18

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Yext Announces Q4 Loss Per Share Of $0.18
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Yext Inc:
* YEXT, INC. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR FISCAL 2018 RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.10
* Q4 REVENUE $48 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $48 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.12 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q1 2019 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.11 TO $0.13
* SEES Q1 2019 REVENUE $49 MILLION TO $50 MILLION * ‍ISSUES REVENUE GUIDANCE OF $49.0 MILLION - $50.0 MILLION FOR Q1 FISCAL 2019​
* ‍NON-GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE IS PROJECTED TO BE $0.44 TO $0.46 FOR FY FISCAL 2019​
* FY2019 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.46, REVENUE VIEW $225.4 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.12, REVENUE VIEW $49.5 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
